dao.name: SEL_ALT_NAM
dao.statement: SELECT CUST_IDX.CUST_COD, CUST_IDX.ALT_NAM, CUST_IDX.FIRST_NAM, CUST_IDX.LAST_NAM, CUST_IDX.CUST_TYP, CUST_IDX.CUST_STA, CUST_IDX.SHOW_COD, SF_GET_CONTACT_BY_TABLE(cust_cod,from_table) contact_rmk, SF_GET_CONTACT_COD_BY_TABLE(cust_cod,from_table) contact_cod FROM CUST_IDX
